school: Faculty of Architecture and Civil Engineering Skills (FACES)
overview:
Architecture at Aryabhatt DSEU Ashok Vihar Campus (formerly known as Aryabhatt Institute of Technology, Ashok Vihar)
Master in Planning – Urban Planning, School of Planning and Architecture, New Delhi
B.Arch. – Government College of Architecture, Lucknow

Mr. Suneet has been an academician for over 22 years. He also worked as Assistant Planner at the Directorate of Marketing & Inspection, Harayan, GoI for 7 years and as a Research Associate at the School of Planning and Architecture, New Delhi. He was awarded The Best Guide award in Architecture in Inter Poly Project Competition (2009),as the first and second prize both went to his mentees and the Pidilite Award for Excellence in Architecture in 2008 by Pidilite Industries. He has undertaken various positions of responsibility and allied duties such as HOD of the Architecture Department, Admission Officer, Syllabus Modernization committee member, Purchase Officer, etc.

Assistant Professor - Automobile Engineering at G.B. Pant DSEU Okhla- III Campus (formerly known as G.B. Pant Institute of Technology)
M.Tech. – Manufacturing Technology, National Institute of Technology, Tiruchirapalli, Tamil Nadu
B.Tech. – Mechanical Engineering, J N T University, Andhra Pradesh /MITS College, Madanapalle, Chittoor, Andhra Pradesh
Diploma – Mechanical Engineering, Govt. Polytechnic College, Anantapur, Andhra Pradesh
Mr. Rama Murthy Naik has been teaching in the Automobile Engineering department since 2011. Prior to that, he was an Assistant professor in Mechanical Engineering at Lovely Professional University. His research area includes manufacturing technology, material characterization, composite materials and automotive.

Mr. Murthy has published a paper in an international conference at IIT Roorkee on “Impact damage detection in GFRP laminates through ultrasonic imaging” and presented a paper in a national conference at Bangalore on “Characterization of mechanical Properties of glass/epoxy laminate with and without graphite particulate filler”

Mr. Lalit has over 15 years of teaching experience. He worked as a content developer for two books published by the Central Board of Secondary Education

M. Tech. – Manufacturing Engineering, Panjab University
B.E. – Mechanical Engineering, Gulbarga University, Karnataka
Mr. Manoj Kumar Mishra has 20 years of teaching experience including 10 years of administrative experience as Head of the department in the Automobile Engineering Department at various colleges under the Directorate of Training and Technical Education. Prior to this he has also served as a Manager in M/s Hindustan Motors Ltd. for 9 years.

Mr. Mishra has received various merit awards/ idea awards from Hindustan Motors Limited. His research interests include Business leadership, Vehicular pollution, Alternative fuel, and green energy for Indian telecom towers.

Associate Professor - Automobile Engineering at DSEU Pusa Campus (formerly known as Pusa Institute of Technology)
M. Tech. – Environmental Science and Engineering, Jamia Millia Islamia, New Delhi
B. Sc. – Mechanical Engineering, Aligarh Muslim University, Aligarh
Mr. Mohammad Arshad has over 12 years of industrial experience and over 20 years of teaching experience.

school: Faculty of Business, Finance and Managerial Skills (FBFMS)

MBA – Marketing, Barkatullah University, Bhopal
B.Tech. – Electronics & Instrumentation, Barkatullah University, Bhopal

Dr. Harvinder Kaur has about 20+ Years of experience in teaching. Her research interest includes Stress Management. She was a Master Trainer in PM Yuva Yojna. She has served as the Head of the BBA department for 12+ years.

Assistant Professor - Automobile Engineering at G.B. Pant DSEU Okhla- III Campus (formerly known as G.B. Pant Institute of Technology)
Ph.D. (pursuing) – Delhi Technological University
M.Tech. – Thermal Engineering, Delhi Technological University
B.E. – Mechanical Engineering, Jamia Millia Islamia, New Delhi
Mr. Naveen Kumar Garg has more than 24 years of teaching experience with different polytechnic institutes of delhi. He has also worked as a Sales and service engineer with leading automotive electrical equipment company, Lucas Indian Service Ltd. and with automotive component manufacturer, Kadambari Asso. (P) Ltd. for 6 years. Prior to this, he was also engaged with automotive servicing organisations dealing with cars and HMV in varied capacities.

Mr. Garg’s areas of interest include Alternative fuels, IC engine, Biodiesel Microwave, Electric Vehicles, and Emission Control. He has actively participated in many National/ International conferences, workshops, seminars, and faculty development programs. He is also a member of The Institution of Engineers (India) and International Association of Engineers (IAENG)

school: Faculty of Business, Finance and Managerial Skills (FBFMS)
overview:
Campus Director - Business Administration at DSEU Vivek Vihar Campus
Ph.D. – Management, Institute of Management Studies, Banaras Hindu University, Varanasi
M.B.A. – UGC-NET & SLET(Haryana state) in Management, from Department of Management, Kurukshetra University, Kurukshetra
M.A. – English Literature, Department of English, Kurukshetra University, Kurukshetra
B.Sc. – Govt. Post Graduate College, Hisar

Dr. Punita Duhan, has 24 years of teaching experience at Post-Graduate & Under-Graduate level and has taught various subjects. Her research interests include Behavioral Marketing, Socio-Digital Technologies, Digital Marketing, Green Marketing, e-Commerce and m-Commerce. She has attended and presented papers in 47 international and national seminars/conferences, has edited 06 books, published 13 research papers and chapters (h-index 6, i10-index 1, Scopus indexed 04), developed study material for IGNOU & NIOS, delivered 20 Expert Lectures and has served as member of Editorial Advisory Boards and as reviewer for international publications. She has organized national and international seminars and has attended 37 FDPs and 27 workshops. Besides, she has served on faculty selection boards of DTTE and has shouldered various administrative roles viz. Purchase Officer, Drawing & Disbursing Officer, In-charge BBA, In-charge Academic (Degree) and APIO. She has contributed to the organization as member of Internal complaint committee, Student Grievance Redressal Committee, RTI Cell, Internal Quality Assurance Cell, Entrepreneurship Cell and “Ek Bharat Shreshtha Bharat” to name a few. Currently she is the lecturer-in-charge of the BBA Department at the DSEU Maharani Bagh Campus.

school: Faculty of Business, Finance and Managerial Skills (FBFMS)
overview:
Assistant Professor - Banking, Financial Services & Insurance at DSEU Dwarka Campus (formerly known as Integrated Institute of Technology, Dwarka)
Post-Doctoral Fellow – Finance (pursuing) – Universiti Malaysia Perlis
Ph.D. – Commerce, Indira Gandhi National Open University (IGNOU), Delhi
Master of Financial Analysis – ICFAI, Tripura
Chartered Financial Analyst – ICFAI, Tripura
B.Com. (Hons.) – University of Delhi

Dr. Parul Kumar is a keen researcher, trainer, and educator, having experience of 11+ years. She is a certified Smart PLS trainer & Mendeley advisor. Her research interests include financial markets, Foreign Portfolio Investors, Online Education, Behavioral finance, Corporate Governance, MOOCs, Employee Psychology, and Social Sciences. She also holds certification in Data Analytics, Predictive Modelling, Financial Modelling, & Regression Analysis, from Wharton, John Hopkins, and Rice University.

Dr. Kumar has been awarded the Best Business Academic of the year, a silver medal, by the India Commerce Association at the 70th All India Commerce Conference, Jaipur. She has authored & co-authored various research papers, published in SSCI, Scopus, ABDC, and UGC Care journals. She has conducted corporate training sessions/ FDP/workshops on SPSS, Smart PLS, AMOS, EViews & Advance Excel. Has also taken several sessions on Regression Analysis, Structural Equation Modeling, Research Methodology, Research Paper writing and Data Analysis at various institutes of high repute.

Assistant Director (Technical) - Administration and Training at DSEU Wazirpur – I Campus (formerly Known as Delhi Institute of Tool Engineering, Wazirpur)
B. Tech – Mechanical Engineering, Sardar Vallabhbhai National Institute of Technology, Surat

Mr. Saumendra Narayan Das was nominated by the Danish Embassy as the observer for all Indo-Danish Tool Rooms in India in HRD Task Force (Training and policy making). He was given appreciation with his team for manufacturing defense products for the Defence Research and Development Organisation. He has also conceptualized and implemented a scheme called “ASHRAY “to optimize training and output involving students and faculty.

Associate Professor - Automobile Engineering at G.B. Pant DSEU Okhla- III Campus (formerly known as G.B. Pant Institute of Technology)
Ph.D. – Mechanical Engineering, University of Delhi, Delhi
M.E. – Mechanical Engineering, University of Delhi, Delhi
MBA – Human Resources Management, Indira Gandhi National Open University (IGNOU), Delhi
Post Graduate Diploma – Computer Applications, Indira Gandhi National Open University, Delhi
Associate Member of Institution of Engineers – Mechanical Engineering, The Institution of Engineers
Dr. Ranbir Singh Sharma has more than 20 years of teaching experience. His areas of expertise in the engineering field are thermal engineering, automotive engines, mathematical modeling, and simulation of combustion processes of diesel and CNG-diesel dual-fuel engines. He has completed 31 short-term courses and 3 courses of NPTEL-SWAYAM successfully. He is a Life Member of the Institution of Engineers with membership No. M/147695/5. He has received 6 official appreciation letters of excellent performance for conducting CET-2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, and 2020 for Delhi state.

school: Faculty of Business, Finance and Managerial Skills (FBFMS)
overview:
Assistant Professor - Banking, Financial Services & Insurance at Bhai Parmanand DSEU Shakarpur Campus – II (formerly known as Bhai Parmanand Institute of Business Studies, Shakarpur)
Ph.D. (pursuing) – Commerce, School of Management Studies, Indira Gandhi National Open University (IGNOU), Delhi
M.Com. – Delhi School of Economics, University of Delhi
B.Com. (Hons.) – Khalsa College, University of Delhi

Ms. Preeti Bedi has a rich teaching experience of more than 8 years in various colleges of University of Delhi and GGSIP University. Her major research interests include financial markets, Corporate Governance and Corporate Social Responsibility. She has discharged varied academic responsibilities and has been the college representative to GGSIP university for course revision under NEP. She is a registered expert under AICTE-SLAP (Student Learning Assessment Project Cell). She has published and presented various research papers in national and international journals/conferences. She has also participated in various FDP/workshops on Research Methodology, tools, and innovative pedagogy.

school: Faculty of Business, Finance and Managerial Skills (FBFMS)
overview:
Campus Director - Business Administration Department ,School of Employability and Holistic Development & School of Innovation and Entrepreneurship Delhi Skills and Entrepreneurship University, Delhi at Kasturba DSEU Pitampura Campus (formerly known as Kasturba Institute of Technology, Pitampura)
PhD, Department of Commerce, University of Allahabad (2009).
UGC NET Labour Welfare/Personnel Management/Industrial Relations/ Labour and Social Welfare/ Human Resource Management (June 2012).
MBA (HR), University of Gorakhpur, Gorakhpur.
B.Sc.: Botany, Chemistry, University of Gorakhpur, Gorakhpur.

Dr. Tripathi comes with more than two decades of experience in teaching, training, research, partnerships, and consultation. She is sufficiently accomplished in establishing international academic standards at the university level. She is now serving as a Founding Professor to establish the SOEHD and launch SEL as a core course cutting across different semesters and programs of DSEU in alignment with NEP 2020. She is also Nodal Project In-Charge of the Village Adoption Program under “Rajypal Vikas ke Rajdoot Campaign”.
She serves as an External Advisor, DAB at Project & Monitoring Division, NCERT from 2021-2024. She is also part of the Advisory Committee of NCERT to implement GCED and ESD as part of the curriculum in all the classes (from class 1 to class 12) across India. She is a Ph.D. from the University of Allahabad; NET qualified and has a first-class academic career.
Her work experience includes teaching/training online/offline of Class IV employees to Class I level officers (Police officers, District Administration Officials, etc.), Ph.D. Scholars, principals of colleges, PSU officials, CWG volunteers, defense personnel, Students of Pan-African Countries, corporates, and trade union leaders, apart from regular PG/UG level students.

Her research interests include Quality Of Life, Sustainable Development, Quality of Work-life, Global Citizenship, emerging issues of management and technology like the impact of diversity and digitalization, change in societal values on career decisions etc. Her other areas of interest include emotional intelligence, leadership, innovative work practices, social audits, attrition etc. She has presented/written more than 50 research papers in International and National journals of repute. She also has a patent in the area of CRM.

school: Faculty of Business, Finance and Managerial Skills (FBFMS)
overview:
Assistant Professor - Banking, Financial Services, and Insurance at DSEU Dwarka Campus (formerly known as Integrated Institute of Technology, Dwarka)
Ph.D. (pursuing) – Economics, Indian Institute of Technology, Bhubaneswar
MBA – School of Business, Public Policy, and Social Entrepreneurship, Ambedkar University Delhi
B.B.E (Bachelors in Business Economics) – College of Vocational Studies, University of Delhi

Mr. Siddharth Kumar has worked as a teaching assistant at IIT Bhubaneswar in the areas of Economics, Banking, and International Business during his Ph.D. tenure. His current research interests include insurance economics, development economics, and promoting insurance inclusion in developing countries. He has published several papers in various international journals, including Singapore Economic Review; Environmental Science and Pollution Research, etc. He is also a reviewer in Finance Research Letters and Journal of the Asia Pacific Economy, and a member of the Society for Financial Studies. He was awarded UGC-NET & JRF in 2016 in the field of Management.

school: Faculty of Business, Finance and Managerial Skills (FBFMS)
overview:
Assistant Professor - Business Administration at Meerabai DSEU Maharani Bagh Campus (formerly known as Meerabai Institute of Technology, Maharani Bagh)
M.Phil. – Management, Madurai Kamaraj University
M.Com. – Himachal Pradesh University

Ms. Simmi Kochar joined the Department of Training and Technical Education in 2000 as a lecturer (SP). Since then, she has been posted at DSEU Maharani Bagh Campus. For over 5 years she has been the in-charge of the Modern Office Practice Department. She has also been working as the in-charge of scholarship for National Scholarship Portal and E- District portal.

She has also performed duties as a student advisor, staff development officer, and Assistant Purchase Officer. She conducted a short-term course on ‘Enhancing motivation, self-esteem, and professionalism in polytechnic teachers.’ She acted as a paper setter and moderator in DGE&T, Ministry of Labour, CBSE, Delhi Subordinate Services Selection Board, and Board of Technical Education.

She has also worked as a member of Anti copying Squad during the Board of Technical Education exam and been a member of various committees viz Canteen committee and miscellaneous committee etc. She has also been a Deputy Superintendent (exams) in 2015 and 2020.

Associate Professor - Automobile Engineering at DSEU Pusa Campus (formerly known as Pusa Institute of Technology)
Ph. D. – Environmental Science, Gulbarga University, Kalaburagi
M. Tech. – Environmental Science, Jamia Millia Islamia, New Delhi
M.B.A – Marketing Management, IGNOU, New Delhi
B. E. – Automobile Engineering, Karnataka University, Dharwar
Dr. S.L. Bhandarkar has 15 years of teaching experience. Apart from teaching, he had the roles of Training and Placement officer, Deputy Director at Directorate of Training & Technical Education, Controller of Examinations and is currently the Deputy Director. He has also worked as the Nodal officer for B. Voc. and M. Voc. courses and devised the syllabus for the same. He has authored 3 books, and published several papers in National/International Conferences and Journals.

Lecturer - Chemical Engineering at Guru Nanak Dev DSEU Rohini Campus (formerly known as Guru Nanak Dev Institute of Technology, Rohini, Delhi)
Ph. D. – Environmental Engineering, Delhi Technological University, Delhi
M. E. – Chemical Engineering and Technology, Panjab University, Chandigarh
B. Tech. – Chemical and Bio-Engineering, Dr. B.R. Ambedkar Regional Engineering College, Jalandhar
Dr. Achla Kaushal has more than 20 years of teaching experience. She has been the Head of the Chemical Engineering Department since 2000 and handled all administrative and academic tasks of the department. Her field of interest is Environmental Engineering. She has also accomplished allied responsibilities such as managing Eco-club, the Women Harassment Cell, Students’ Grievance cell, and Employee Complaint Committee for the last four years. She has facilitated the purchase of a Sanitary napkin vending machine and incinerator for the girl students at Guru Nanak Dev DSEU Rohini Campus and also helped other campuses purchase the same.

Assistant Professor - Chemistry at Aryabhatt DSEU Ashok Vihar Campus (formerly known as Aryabhatt Institute of Technology, Ashok Vihar)
Ph.D. – Applied Physics, Delhi Technological University, Delhi
M.Sc. – Physics, Gauhati University, Guwahati
B.Sc. – Physics, Cotton College, Gauhati University, Guwahati

Dr. Jiten Boruah is a lecturer having more than 20 years of teaching experience. His research interests include designing Photonic crystal, Photonic crystal based optoelectronic devices and fibre for various applications in sensing, imaging, fibre to the home and nonlinear applications like supercontinuum generation.

Dr. Boruah is a member of SPIE – The International Society of Optical Engineering. He is also a reviewer of various international journals like Optical engineering, and the Journal of Nanophotonics.
